DataElement.preferredName: Ophthalmic Examinations Domain Teller Acuity Right Eye Assessment Not Done Reason Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Description of the reason why Teller Grating Acuity testing for the right eye was not completed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ophthalmic Examinations Domain Teller Acuity Cards Right Eye Assessment Not Done Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to ophthalmic examinations._A diagrammatic method to test visual acuity that uses a set of cards with parallel lines, used for those individuals who are unable to provide a verbal response to questions, including infants, toddlers, and other non verbal individuals._The eye positioned in the right orbit._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
